Package fr.sorbonne_u.datacenter.interfaces

Interface ControlledDataOfferedI

  • All Superinterfaces:
    fr.sorbonne_u.components.interfaces.ComponentServiceI, fr.sorbonne_u.components.interfaces.DataOfferedI, fr.sorbonne_u.components.interfaces.OfferedI, java.rmi.Remote
    public interface ControlledDataOfferedI
extends fr.sorbonne_u.components.interfaces.DataOfferedI
    The interface ControlledDataOfferedI defines the data exchange services offered by a server component where the pushing of data can be explicitly started and stopped by the client component.

    Description

    The interface extends the standard DataOfferedI with its methods to pull and push data. Its pull interface also extends PushModeControllingI to start and stop pushing of data in the server to be used by the client to manage its notification reception periods.

    Created on : October 1, 2015

    Author:
    Jacques Malenfant
